data.text:
This page is intended as an index or at least a form of one , to complement the categories and search facility. It is Alphabetical in Party/Group order. (there is no order re candidate names etc).

Am currently updating it and links to a number of PD , Priorites Party, People Before Profit and Sinn Fein leaflets have gone awol . Hope to rectify in the next day or so. (Jan 12th 2012)

2016 General Election leaflets can be found here
